v.v: May Yahweh help you in the day of trouble;
and send help from the holy place
May he call to mind all your offerings
May he grant you your heartâ€™s desire
Then we will rejoice in your victory,
Now I know that Yahweh will rescue his anointed one;
Some trust in chariots and others in horses,
They will be brought down and fall,

v: may the name of the God of Jacob protect you
and, in the name of our God, we will raise banners.
May Yahweh grant all your petitions.
he will answer him from his holy heaven
with the strength of his right hand that can rescue him.
but we call on Yahweh our God.
but we will rise and stand upright!
